languages.text: {n}Кажется, ваши слова все же достигают разума друкари. Маражай встряхивает головой и прикрывает глаза — вы видите, как он делает глубокий вдох и едва заметно опускает плечи.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Кажется, ваши слова таки достигают разума друкари. Маражай встряхивает головой и прикрывает глаза — вы видите, как он делает глубокий вдох и едва заметно опускает плечи.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Your words appear to have reached Marazhai's mind. He shakes his head and closes his eyes, then you watch him take a deep breath and relax his shoulders ever so slightly.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кажется, ваши слова все же достигают разума друкари. Маражай встряхивает головой и прикрывает глаза — вы видите, как он делает глубокий вдох и едва заметно опускает плечи.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your words appear to have reached Marazhai's mind. He shakes his head and closes his eyes, then you watch him take a deep breath and relax his shoulders ever so slightly.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Vos paroles semblent avoir atteint la conscience de Marazhai. Il secoue la tête et ferme les yeux, puis prend une profonde inspiration tout en roulant légèrement les épaules, comme pour se détendre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words appear to have reached Marazhai's mind. He shakes his head and closes his eyes, then you watch him take a deep breath and relax his shoulders ever so slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos paroles semblent avoir atteint la conscience de Marazhai. Il secoue la tête et ferme les yeux, puis prend une profonde inspiration tout en roulant légèrement les épaules, comme pour se détendre.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}あなたの言葉はマラズハイの心に届いたらしい。彼は頭を振って目を閉じ、深呼吸をしてからわずかに肩の力を抜く。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words appear to have reached Marazhai's mind. He shakes his head and closes his eyes, then you watch him take a deep breath and relax his shoulders ever so slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの言葉はマラズハイの心に届いたらしい。彼は頭を振って目を閉じ、深呼吸をしてからわずかに肩の力を抜く。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}你的话似乎沉入了玛拉斋的意识中。他摇摇头，闭上眼睛。你看到他深吸了一口气，轻轻地放松了肩膀的肌肉。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words appear to have reached Marazhai's mind. He shakes his head and closes his eyes, then you watch him take a deep breath and relax his shoulders ever so slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的话似乎沉入了玛拉斋的意识中。他摇摇头，闭上眼睛。你看到他深吸了一口气，轻轻地放松了肩膀的肌肉。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Deine Worte scheinen Marazhais Verstand erreicht zu haben. Er schüttelt den Kopf und schließt die Augen, dann siehst du zu, wie er tief durchatmet und ganz leicht die Schultern entspannt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words appear to have reached Marazhai's mind. He shakes his head and closes his eyes, then you watch him take a deep breath and relax his shoulders ever so slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Worte scheinen Marazhais Verstand erreicht zu haben. Er schüttelt den Kopf und schließt die Augen, dann siehst du zu, wie er tief durchatmet und ganz leicht die Schultern entspannt.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Tus palabras parecen llegar a la mente de Marazhai. El xenos sacude la cabeza y cierra los ojos, luego ves que inspira profundamente y sus hombros se relajan de manera casi imperceptible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words appear to have reached Marazhai's mind. He shakes his head and closes his eyes, then you watch him take a deep breath and relax his shoulders ever so slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus palabras parecen llegar a la mente de Marazhai. El xenos sacude la cabeza y cierra los ojos, luego ves que inspira profundamente y sus hombros se relajan de manera casi imperceptible.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Sözlerin Marazhai'ın zihnine ulaşmış gibi görünüyor. Başını sallayıp gözlerini kapıyor, sonrasında da derin bir nefes aldığını ve omuzlarını hafifçe gevşettiğini görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words appear to have reached Marazhai's mind. He shakes his head and closes his eyes, then you watch him take a deep breath and relax his shoulders ever so slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sözlerin Marazhai'ın zihnine ulaşmış görünüyor. Başını sallıyor ve gözlerini kapıyor, ardından derin bir nefes aldığını ve omuzlarını hafifçe gevşettiğini görüyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
